snippet.title: Sonic & Tails - SAGE 2018 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Windows: https://www.sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-tails.195/
Android: https://drive.google.com/open?id=156W39fa6-eDNc-vF5BVc5HPNTWdwxxLa
Android version may lag on older phones or phones without Graphics cards.

Sonic & Tails is a fan made Sonic the Hedgehog game, which focuses on the story of Sonic's adventures on North Island.
Sonic & Tails takes place on North Island. Dr. Eggman has created a doomsday device which is set to go off in three days. Sonic and Tails set out to collect the seven Chaos Emeralds, before he unleashes mass destruction onto the entire planet. Meanwhile, the story of the mysteriously vanished tribe unfolds.

Controls:
F2 - Restart
F4 - Fullscreen

Keyboard Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
A/Z - Jump and Primary Shield Action
X - Jump or Secondary Shield Action
Enter - Pause

Gamepad Controls:
Analog Stick (D-pad in Menu) - Move
A/X (Xbox) || Cross/Square (PlayStation) - Jump and Primary Shield Action
B (Xbox) || Circle (PlayStation) - Jump or Secondary Shield Action
Start - Pause

Sonic is able to Super Peal-Out and Dropdash with zero charge time. Sonic can also spindash of course. Tails assist flying is a planned feature for the future.

Thank you for downloading this fangame, we hope you enjoy it.

I'd like to give a huge thanks to AeroGP for all the assistance provided while making this demo.
Shortened credits, full available in-game:
Project Leader
- BlueCore
Artist
- MrLevRocks
Programmer
- BlueCore
Music
- Lyrical Lull
- dante
- Azure
- BlueCore

All characters including Sonic, Tails and Dr. Ivo "Eggman" Robotnik are (C) by SEGA 1991,1992
